column1: Little Goat Diner////I was pretty disappointed by their bakery section. Got the gluten-free strawberry muffin and lemon (I think?) rosemary scone
column2: the two most highly recommended items by the lady working the cash register
column3: and they were just NOT okay. Couldn't even finish half of it. But the place looked cute and I heard that actual restaurant was really good. Gotta still give them a star for super friendly service. The guys let us sit on the table outside even though we weren't dining in.
